main.name: Thomas Bui
main.description: Long-time educator with experience living and working abroad.  Making a career transition towards software development and engineering.
main.bio: Tech enthusiast with a strong background working in education.  8+ years in education, with 5 years spent teaching in Japan.  Hobbyist programmer for many years using python and C++.  Self taught topics in the past year include computer graphics, web development, databases, machine learning. Currently fascinated by compilers and interpreters.  Hobbies outside of work and programming include runnning, calisthenics, and learning about nutrition.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Some of my communication and technical capabilities

education.degree: B.S. in Electrical Engineering, specializing in digital signal processing
education.description: Majored in electrical engineering, with a focus on digital signal processing.  Tutored math part-time to fellow students at a local tutoring center.  Received a minor in Japanese, which I would use in my future teaching position in Japan.

work.title: Cofounder
work.description: Cofounded consulting business, Logical Analyzing System for Enterprises, Products and Services (LASEPS) with two other cofounders.  Procured main investment.

work.title: Medical Biller
work.description: Hired for medical billing position and record maintenance.  Responsibilities shifted to office management, including maintaining facility and vaccination storage requirements up to California state code.

work.title: Assistant Language Teacher
work.description: Planned and taught elementary school English lessons.  Assisted primary English teachers in middle and high schools in lessons.  Organized and presented at yearly English teachers conference in Hiroshima city.  Judge and interviewer for Kure City recitation contests and and study-abroad programs.  Studied Japanese and received a JLPT level 2 certificate.

work.title: Math Instructor
work.description: Tutor students 1-on-1 or in small groups in math, including SAT preparation.  Designed a 52 week alegra lesson plan, including explanations, diagrams, problems sets and the corresponding solutions.  Wrote articles for company website.

portfolio.projectmessage: Sample of some of my personal projects.

projects.title: Interpreter (in-progress)
projects.category: C++ implementation of lox language by Robert Nystrom

projects.title: 3d Rasterizer
projects.category: rasterizer written in software using SDL2 for drawing

projects.title: Browser Neural Network
projects.category: Interactive neural network for educational purposes

projects.title: Apple Leaf Disease Classifier
projects.category: Neural network trained to classify apple folial diseases for a Kaggle competition.
